Package cz.masterart.glada.planner

package cz.masterart.glada.planner
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConditionLine
    The planner selects the action ID from the first condition line found in which the entered data matches the conditions.
    The condition line sets the next conditions:
    - start (from) and stop (to) hours - work days only (days without sunday, saturday and legal holidays) - days os week (set of 1..7) - days of month (set of 1..31) - months (set of 1..12)
    ConditionLine.LineBuilder
    Builds the ConditionLine class instance
    Planner
    The helper for loop planning
